resources.string: Battery %1$s percentage, about %2$s left based on your usage
Couldn’t access %1$s. Check the %2$s app to make sure that the control is still available and that the app settings haven’t changed.
Hold and drag to rearrange controls
Choose controls to access from Quick Settings

"The data limit that you set has been reached. You are no longer using mobile data.
If you resume, charges may apply for data usage."
This device belongs to your organisation
App may not work with split-screen.
This notification was automatically promoted to default by the system.
This notification was automatically ranked lower in your shade.
This notification was automatically ranked higher in your shade.
This notification was automatically demoted to silent by the system.
Too many unsuccessful attempts. Enter password now or try using your fingerprint in a few seconds.
You can switch back to using buttons in Settings > Full screen display
There’s an issue charging this device. Unplug the power adaptor, and take care as the cable may be warm.

"Your phone will automatically try to cool down. You can still use your phone, but it may run more slowly.
Once your phone has cooled down, it will run normally."
"Some features are limited while phone cools down. Tap for more info"
This input method may be able to collect all the text that you type, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the app %1$s. Use this input method?
App opened without being installed. Tap to find out more.
Incorrect SIM PIN code; you must now contact your operator to unlock your device.
SIM is unusable. Contact your operator.
SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. Contact operator for details.
SIM \"%1$s\" is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. Contact operator for details.
Go to Settings > Notifications & Control center for more options
Applied successfully. Go to Settings > Notifications & Control center for more options.
"You won't have access to data or the Internet through %s. Internet will only be available via Wi-Fi."
Your organisation installed a certificate authority in your work profile. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.
Your work profile is connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites.

"This device belongs to your organisation.
Your IT admin can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device, and your device's location information.
For more information, contact your IT admin."
Your organisation installed a certificate authority on this device. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.
"You're connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites."
This device is managed by your parent. Your parent can see and manage information such as the apps that you use, your location and your screen time.
Your personal profile is connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
"You're connected to %1$s and %2$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites."

"%1$s may be able to access data associated with this device, manage apps and change this device's settings.
If you have questions, contact %2$s."
May ring or vibrate based on phone settings
May ring or vibrate based on phone settings. Conversations from %1$s bubble by default.
See recent messages, missed calls and status updates
<Data>You have to <font color=#a5220e>erase all data </font>on your device, including photos and contacts, and then set a new Lock screen password.</Data>
Power off your device, then press and hold the [Power] and [Volume +] buttons until you see .
<Data>Select <font color=#a5220e>\"Wipe & Reset\"</font> and wait until the device reboots.</Data>

"With power notification controls, you can set an importance level from 0 to 5 for an app's notifications.
"
Problem connecting. Turn device off and back on
Mobile data (WCDMA/LTE) will be turned off. Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will no longer be able to use apps that require data connection. Sending or receiving multimedia messages will be restricted.
Mobile data will be turned on. Connecting to mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
Your organisation may monitor network traffic in your work profile
Your work profile is connected to %1$s
This device belongs to your organisation
Your organisation owns this device and may monitor network traffic
This device belongs to your organisation and is connected to %1$s
This device belongs to your organisation and is connected to VPNs
This device belongs to %1$s and is connected to %2$s
This device belongs to %1$s and is connected to VPNs
Your personal profile is connected to %1$s
This device is connected to VPNs
Tap to restart this app and go full screen.
To unpin this app, touch and hold Back and Home buttons
Sound from your device, like music, calls and ringtones
"Taking screenshots isn't allowed by the app or your organisation"
Tap a conversation to add it to your home screen
Press and hold the [Power] and [Volume +] buttons until you see .
<Data>Select <font color=#e6e6e6>[Wipe data]</font> and tap <font color=#e6e6e6>[Reboot]</font> after that.</Data>

"Your phone was too hot, so it turned off to cool down. Your phone is now running normally.
Your phone may get too hot if you: \u0009• Use resource-intensive apps (such as gaming, video or navigation apps) \u0009• Download or upload large files \u0009• Use your phone in high temperatures"
"Your device is overheated. Can't use torch now."
These experimental features may change, break or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.
System UI Tuner gives you extra ways to tweak and customise the Android user interface. These experimental features may change, break or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.

"To protect your device from liquid or debris, the USB port is disabled and won’t detect any accessories.
You’ll be notified when it’s OK to use the USB port again."
"The user currently signed in to this device can't turn on USB debugging. To use this feature, switch to the primary user."

"You can share this device with other people by creating additional users. Each user has their own space, which they can customise with apps, wallpaper and so on. Users can also adjust device settings such as Wi‑Fi that affect everyone.
When you add a new user, that person needs to set up their space.
Any user can update apps for all other users. Accessibility settings and services may not transfer to the new user."
There was a problem getting your cards. Please try again later.
The user currently signed in to this device can’t turn on wireless debugging. To use this feature, switch to the primary user.
Place your device on the centre of the charging base
